newsitem.title: USA: 3DX Technologies Inc Q4 shr loss narrows.
newsitem.headline: 3DX Technologies Inc Q4 shr loss narrows.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTE: 1996 results include a charge from redemption premium on preferred stock of $365,809. Dividends on preferred stock were $15,226 in Q4 1996 vs $945,699 in Q4 1995. Dividends on preferred stock were $520,393 in 1996 vs $1,058,956 in 1995.
